steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"9b884","text":"Now on hazel hen you can get a new ssh key with","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3d2ko","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"6bjtj","text":"and copy the public key ( = the output of ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3a8h5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3k844","text":") to all the githubs and gitlabs you'll need. This will allow you to clone onto the machine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"83fcg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":4980,"guid":"8B5AF550C55B11E8B57D8BCF7E9EF2A7","align":null,"name":"ssh-keygen","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"6FD5B9B0C33911E891D6178AAD3BBAFC","command":""}},{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":4981,"guid":"BD5F10E0C55B11E8B57D8BCF7E9EF2A7","align":null,"name":"cat ~\/.ssh\/id_rsa.pub","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"6FD5B9B0C33911E891D6178AAD3BBAFC","command":""}}],"guid":"6FD5B9B0C33911E891D6178AAD3BBAFC","id":669122,"previous_id":669121,"previous_guid":"6FD4F660C33911E891D6178AAD3BBAFC","section":"Set up ssh "}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7hnun","text":"Now back on your own computer (any one on the IP list), you can use a reverse ssh tunnel to clone the relevant repos","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9b4ig","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5hrmv","text":" Command

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2spo","text":"From here on, all steps will have to be well documented!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c7a69","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8sqk5","text":"Enter your workspace on hazel hen, check out the versions of the code you need.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c0g2q","text":"Load all the modules you need, e.g. the gnu compiler suite:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1smdr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"7b471","text":"You can see the available modules with ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3lkdt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6pp0s","text":"If your build tools \/ libraries are not there, install them locally for yourself or request them, ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5o35k","text":"cf https:\/\/wickie.hlrs.de\/platforms\/index.php\/CRAY_XC40_local_Modules .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":3,"length":66,"key":2}],"data":[]},{"key":"431o2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ac7go","text":"Usually you will want to link the program dynamically. To do that, set the environment variable:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c7gl6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":3}],"data":[]},{"key":"26kb4","text":"And you're set to build with your usual toolchain. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d11","text":"Document your modules (`module list`) and environment variables (`declare -p`), and all the changes you made to the code - or better still, `git push` them.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":4983,"guid":"FD61D9D0C56411E8B57D8BCF7E9EF2A7","align":null,"name":"module load PrgEnv-gnu","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"6FD6CB20C33911E891D6178AAD3BBAFC","command":""}},{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":4984,"guid":"429F8740C56511E8B57D8BCF7E9EF2A7","align":null,"name":"module avail","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"6FD6CB20C33911E891D6178AAD3BBAFC","command":""}},{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https:\/\/wickie.hlrs.de\/platforms\/index.php\/CRAY_XC40_local_Modules"}},{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":4985,"guid":"CB372370C56411E8B57D8BCF7E9EF2A7","align":null,"name":"export CRAYPE_LINK_TYPE=dynamic","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"6FD6CB20C33911E891D6178AAD3BBAFC","command":""}}],"guid":"6FD6CB20C33911E891D6178AAD3BBAFC","id":669124,"previous_id":669123,"previous_guid":"6FD62EE0C33911E891D6178AAD3BBAFC","section":"Prepare and build"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f55nj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7s77m","text":"request an interactive job on a MOM node with","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"de8mb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"74r5r","text":"From here, you can submit the job via aprun (not mpirun!), e.g. with a bash script: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8o7s5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"98f4d","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ci9gv","text":" cf https:\/\/wickie.hlrs.de\/platforms\/index.php\/CRAY_XC40_Using_the_Batch_System on how exactly this works","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":4,"length":75,"key":2}],"data":[]},{"key":"51j01","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e99af","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2b6m1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":4986,"guid":"DD32D390C56311E8B57D8BCF7E9EF2A7","align":null,"name":"qsub -I -l nodes=1:ppn=24,walltime=01:00:00","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"BB4F0BB0C55211E8807167753B24DB2C","command":""}},{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"key":"9vra9","text":"#! \/bin\/bash  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"elpei","text":"#PBS -N <job_name> ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7gqiu","text":"#PBS -l nodes=<number_of_nodes>:ppn=24 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"arq0l","text":"#PBS -l walltime=00:01:00  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4bf3b","text":"cd $PBS_O_WORKDIR # This is the directory where this script and the executable are located.  # You can choose any other directory on the lustre file system.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cb3c0","text":"export OMP_NUM_THREADS=<nt> ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"659k3","text":"<aprun_command> ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}},{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https:\/\/wickie.hlrs.de\/platforms\/index.php\/CRAY_XC40_Using_the_Batch_System"}}],"guid":"D4499521BA5F4862A6877EEC342CEDC2","id":672273,"previous_id":672272,"previous_guid":"435915C0E54048E8A37DF28C8CB60BE7","section":"Running jobs"}
